code: import React from'react';import{useState,useEffect}from'react';import{Box,Stack,Typography}from'@mui/material';import SideBar from'./SideBar';import Videos from'./Videos';import{FetchFromApi}from'../utils/FetchFromApi';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Feed=()=>{const[selectedCategories,setselectedCategories]=useState("New");const[videos,setVideos]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{FetchFromApi("search?q=".concat(selectedCategories)).then(data=>setVideos(data.items));},[selectedCategories]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Stack,{sx:{flexDirection:{sx:"column",md:"row"}},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Box,{sx:{height:{sx:"auto",md:"92vh"},borderRight:"1px solid #3d3d3d",px:{sx:0,md:2}},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(SideBar,{selectedCategories:selectedCategories,setselectedCategories:setselectedCategories}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{className:"copyright",variant:"body2",sx:{mt:1.5,color:"#fff"},children:"Copyright 2022 YT clone"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Box,{p:2,sx:{overflowY:"auto",height:"90vh",flex:2},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Typography,{variant:"h4",fontWeight:"bold",mb:2,sx:{color:"white"},children:[selectedCategories," ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{style:{color:"#f31503"},children:"Videos"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Videos,{videos:videos})]})]});};export default Feed;

sourcesContent: import React from 'react' import { useState,useEffect} from 'react' import { Box,Stack,Typography} from '@mui/material' import SideBar from './SideBar' import Videos from './Videos' import { FetchFromApi } from '../utils/FetchFromApi' const Feed = () => { const [selectedCategories, setselectedCategories] = useState("New") const [videos, setVideos] = useState([]) useEffect(() => { FetchFromApi(`search?q=${selectedCategories}`) .then((data) =>setVideos(data.items)) } ,[selectedCategories]) return ( Copyright 2022 YT clone {selectedCategories} Videos ) } export default Feed
